posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe D.
I picked up his autograph, and i would like to frame it with a card or even just a nice photo.

so - eye appeal is more important than rare collectible (but a card would be cool).

please email if you have any for sale/ trade / or just a suggestion.

Thanks,
Joe

Posted By: leon
I have a nice WG3 Hoy being graded at SGC right now if you are interested. It will probably come back a 40-60 (hard to tell on these cards)....lmk if interested and I can hold it for you to see if we can do something....should have it back in about a week....thanks

edited to add I think this is actually Dummy Taylor I have that is being graded...sorry, my mistake...

Posted By: Joe D.
thanks leon.

Posted By: Danny


Hello..  I noticed you have Dummy Hoy WG3 and some Taylor cards? Im a huge Deaf Baseball Players collector. You should see my homepage as i just set up. I have few Hoy OJ, game used pants, many autograph. Let me know. I would like to see what you have.. Please e-mail also-

[url]http://homepage.mac.com/jennifermari/Menu10.html[/url]

take care,

Danny
